Package: grails.utils

[Groovy] Enum DaysOfWeek

    • grails.utils.DaysOfWeek

    • DaysOfWeek is an ENUM which declares physical week days i.e. SUN MON, The ENUM values contains : a bitwise operation known locally as variable value -- is fixed the week day representation known locally as dow -- is fixed a boolean true/false known locally as isWeekend -- is modifiable. -> configures a default week or weekend day is overridden in DayComparator This class takes java locale and converts to com.ibm.icu.util.ULocale and returns a final result

      Authors:
      Vahid Hedayati April 2019

      • Nested Class Summary

          Nested classes 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static class  DaysOfWeek.DayComparator Comparator to return week days as per locale of end user It does a few things :
          private static class  DaysOfWeek.DowComparator Basic minimal comparator comparing lowest to highest and returning a list of DaysOfWeek array above based on dow setting within ENUM

      • Field Summary

          Fields 
          Modifiers Name Description
          private static DaysOfWeek.DowComparator  dowComparator Static comparator that returns results based on order of dow value in ascending order fixed result set will always return SUN MON TUE WED etc..

        • private static final DaysOfWeek.DowComparator dowComparator

          Static comparator that returns results based on order of dow value in ascending order fixed result set will always return SUN MON TUE WED etc.. To call DaysOfWeek.getDaysOfWeek() which returns a collection of days of week

        • static java.util.List<java.lang.String> daysByLocale(java.util.Locale locale)

          List myDays = DaysOfWeek.daysOfWeek(Locale.UK) myDays = ['Mon','TUE',...'SUN'] //in order of local first week day JDK provides this method to get first day of week Calendar.getInstance(locale1).getFirstDayOfWeek() which in some cases is not true presentation using ICU4J

        • static java.util.List<java.lang.String> fromBitValueToList(int origBitMask, java.util.Locale locale = Locale.UK)

        • static byte fromListToBit(java.util.List<java.lang.String> daysOfWeek)

          Byte bit1 = DaysOfWeek.fromListToBit(['MON','TUE']) Byte bit2 = DaysOfWeek.fromListToBit(['MON','SAT','SUN'])

          Parameters:
          daysOfWeek - a list containing string names of days of week
          Returns:
          a byte sum for those weekdays = what user sees as dow byte value.

        • static void initialiseEnumByLocale(java.util.Locale locale)

          Dynamically set data of the enum on call 1. Attempts to override isWeekend ENUM value set in current ENUM to match the end locale 2. set the correct short/long name of the day of the week based on provided locale
